title: Drawing, Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California, 1968–69
title_raw: Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California
medium: brush and reddish-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper ruled in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite near right edge with color notations
provenance: Eric Elsesser, California; 1993: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Life-size cartoon of partial Hebrew text in three lines showing partial hand at left edge and partial citrus fruit "etrog" at right edge.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California, 1968–69. brush and reddish-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper ruled in graphite. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-73-a.
